title: Powerful Hurricane Beryl roars towards Jamaica
content: At least seven people die as a result of the powerful hurricane raging across the Caribbean.
summary: At least seven people die as a result of the powerful hurricane raging across the Caribbean.

title: 'Almost whole island homeless' in Hurricane Beryl's wake

title: Israeli strike kills senior Hezbollah commander in Lebanon

title: Belarus frees five political prisoners in rare amnesty

title: Gazans seek shelter as Khan Younis exodus continues

title: President's daughter posts kiss with woman in country where gay sex is banned
